itunes:title: Episode 2 - The Social Revolution
title: Episode 2 - The Social Revolution
description: Max and a special guest dive into the stories behind what it took to deliver Halo 2’s groundbreaking online innovations - parties, clans, matchmaking, the ranking system, cut features, and much more.
content:encoded: Max and a special guest dive into the stories behind what it took to deliver Halo 2’s groundbreaking online innovations - parties, clans, matchmaking, the ranking system, cut features, and much more.
itunes:author: Andy "Bravo" Dudynsky
